burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.rbf

Class RBF

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.rbf.RBF
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaussianRBF

    public abstract class RBF
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for defining RBF units. An RBF unit is defined by a centered state and a distance metric that can be used to measure the distance between the unit's center and an input state. RBF units return a response value to an input state that is a function of the distance from the unit's centered state to the input state. Different RBF subclasses implement the response function differently. The less distant an input state is from a unit's center state, the greater the response value.
    Author:
    Anubhav Malhotra and Daniel Fernandez and Spandan Dutta

    • Method Detail

      • responseFor

        public abstract double responseFor(State input)
        Returns a response value to an input state that is a function of the distance between the input and this unit's center state. The less distant a query state is from this unit's center state, the greater the resposne value.
        Parameters:
        input - the input state for which a response value is returned.
        Returns:
        a response value to the given input state
